subject: CNN Alerts: My Custom Alert
body:
CNN Alerts: My Custom Alert






 



Alert Name: My Custom Alert
Organ-transplant jet crashes in Lake Michigan

06/04/07 09:37 PM, EDT
A medical transport jet carrying an organ transplant team went down Monday afternoon in Lake Michigan shortly after the pilot signaled an emergency, authorities said. There was no word on survivors.
FULL STORY
